paragraphs.text:
%sh

# if [[-d /tmp/ml-latest]]; then
#     rm -fr /tmp/ml-latest
#     echo "Removed existing folder"
# fi

wget -q -O /tmp/ml-latest.zip http://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-latest.zip
echo "Dowloaded ml-latest.zip ..."

unzip /tmp/ml-latest.zip -d /tmp/
rm /tmp/ml-latest.zip
echo "Unpacked ml-latest.zip ..."

dir0=/tmp/datalake
dir1=links
dir2=movies
dir3=ratings
dir4=tags
dir5=/user/zeppelin/sparkDF/input

for dir in $dir1 $dir2 $dir3 $dir4;do
# if [[-d $dir0/$dir]]; then
#     rm -r $dir0/$dir1
# fi
    mkdir -p $dir0/$dir
    
    mv /tmp/ml-latest/$dir.csv $dir0/$dir/
    echo "Moved $dir.csv to $dir0/$dir/ ..."
done

rm -r /tmp/ml-latest
echo "Datalake files created!"

hdfs dfs -mkdir -p $dir5
echo "Directory $dir5 created in hdfs"
hdfs dfs -put -f $dir0/$dir3/$dir3.csv $dir0/$dir2/$dir2.csv $dir5
echo "Copy $dir3.csv to hdfs://$dir5 complete"
echo "Copy $dir2.csv to hdfs://$dir5 complete"

paragraphs.text:
%spark.ipyspark

columns_to_convert = sorted_df.columns[1:3]

filtered_df = reduce(lambda df, x: df.withColumn(x, blank_as_null(x)), columns_to_convert, sorted_df).dropna()

%spark.ipyspark

rdd_df = filtered_df.rdd.map(list)
top_N_rdd = rdd_df.map(lambda line: (line[0], (line[1], line[2], line[3])))                                            # map to tuple (genre,(title, year, rating))
top_N_rdd = top_N_rdd.groupByKey()                                                                                     # group by genre
top_N_rdd = top_N_rdd.map(lambda line: (line[0], sorted((list(line[1])), key=lambda line: line[2], reverse=True)))     # map to tuple (genre, [title, year, rating]) for all fims and sort by rating high to low
top_N_rdd = top_N_rdd.map(lambda line: (line[0], line[1][0:N]))                                                        # map to tuple (genre, [title, year, rating]) for top N films
top_N_rdd = top_N_rdd.flatMap(lambda line: [(line[0], element[0], element[1], element[2]) for element in (line[1])])   # map to tuple (genre, title, year, rating) for top N films
top_N_rdd = top_N_rdd.sortBy(lambda line: line)                                                                        # sort by genres
